name: The Legend of Big Bird's Bones
name_original: The Legend of Big Bird's Bones
description:
A jam game for the Idle Thumbs Community Game Jam, Wizard Jam.

As usually happens I over-scoped, got too hung up on weird stuff and ended up with just a generic turn-based RPG system. Apparently it takes a long time to implement just the BASIC STUFF! Whodathunkit?!

Anyway, here is the game in all its glory. Thanks to toblix for all the wonderful music.

Use Z and X to do stuff and arrow keys to move around.
